sentences.en: chocolate fingers
sentences.cn: 巧克力条

sentences.en: don't put retirement planning on the long finger.
sentences.cn: 不要推迟考虑退休计划。

sentences.en: Forensic evidence points the finger of suspicion firmly at him.
sentences.cn: 法医的证据将怀疑的矛头明确地指向了他。

sentences.en: he cannot put his finger on what has gone wrong.
sentences.cn: 他搞不清出了什么错。

sentences.en: He claims to have his finger on the pulse of the industry.
sentences.cn: 他声称该对行业了如指掌。

sentences.en: He explored the wound with his finger, trying to establish its extent.
sentences.cn: 他用手指摸了摸伤口，想要确定受伤的程度。

sentences.en: he keeps his finger on the pulse of world music.
sentences.cn: 他了解世界音乐的最新动向。

sentences.en: He pointed a stubby finger at a wooden chair opposite him.
sentences.cn: 他伸出一根粗短的手指指向他对面的一把木椅。

sentences.en: He poked a long bony finger in Billy's chest.
sentences.cn: 他用细长的手指捅了一下比利的胸口。

sentences.en: He suffered a hairline fracture of the right index finger.
sentences.cn: 他右手食指骨裂。

sentences.en: He very much likes to have a finger in every pie.
sentences.cn: 他很喜欢什么事都插上一杠。

sentences.en: His finger nails were square and cut neatly across.
sentences.cn: 他的手指甲是方形的，修剪得很齐。

sentences.en: I started to cry because I cut my finger.
sentences.cn: 我因为割破手指哭了起来。

sentences.en: Isn't it about time that you pulled your finger out?
sentences.cn: 现在到了你该赶紧动起来的时候了吧？

sentences.en: Midge couldn't quite put her finger on the reason.
sentences.cn: 米吉还不能十分确定原因何在。

sentences.en: Nick jabbed his finger at the clothes on the bed.
sentences.cn: 尼克用手指戳了戳床上的衣服。

sentences.en: Police and prosecutors manipulated the eyewitnesses so they would finger Aldo.
sentences.cn: 警方和检察官操纵目击证人指证奥尔多。

sentences.en: She never lifted a finger around the house.
sentences.cn: 家里的活儿她从来一点忙都不帮。

sentences.en: The Aussie was in agony with a broken finger.
sentences.cn: 这个澳大利亚人承受着断指之痛。

sentences.en: The woman had a ring on her finger, so I assumed she was married.
sentences.cn: 那女人手指上戴着戒指，因此我猜想她已经结婚了。

sentences.en: We ate with our fingers.
sentences.cn: 我们用手抓着吃。

words.tran_cn: 指法；用指摸弄；手指弹奏；指法符号；细绒线
用手指触摸；指出；谴责；用指弹奏（finger的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)行动笨拙，笨手笨脚
指尖；（射箭等用的）指尖套
(英，非正式)立即开始行动，赶紧行动起来

phrases.phrase: get one's fingers burned/burnt (或 burn one's finge

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)向某人伸出中指（表示蔑视）

phrases.phrase: have (或 keep) one's finger on the pulse
phrases.tran_cn: 把握脉搏；了解最新动向

phrases.phrase: have a finger in every pie
have a finger in the pie
phrases.tran_cn: 染指；参与其事；横加干涉
确切地指出，弄明白，搞清楚

phrases.phrase: put something on the long finger

phrases.tran_cn: （尤指为立刻引起注意或打节拍时）弹响指

phrases.phrase: twist (或 wind 或 wrap) someone around one's little
work one's fingers to the bone

trans.tran_en: one of the four long thin parts on your hand, not including your thumb
to touch or handle something with your fingers
